price: 25. Nous tirâmes vengeance d’eux. Vois quel fut le sort de ceux qui ont osé démentir !
arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-intaqamnā min'hum fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
